question: Show mobile banking customers and internet banking customers that use biometric authentication.
sql_query1:
SELECT Customers.FullName
FROM Customers
WHERE (Customers.Digital_Solutions = "Mobile Banking App" OR Customers.Digital_Solutions = "Internet Banking Platform") AND Customers.Sign_in_Options = "Biometric Authentication"
sql_query2:
SELECT Customers.FullName
FROM Customers
WHERE Customers.Digital_Solutions = "Mobile Banking App" OR Customers.Digital_Solutions = "Internet Banking Platform" AND Customers.Sign_in_Options = "Biometric Authentication"
interpretation1: What mobile banking customers use biometric authentication and what internet banking customers also use it?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all mobile banking customers and also provide a list of online banking customers that use biometric authentication.
